# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/dot`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for doT (http://github.com/olado/dot).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/dot.

 * Dependencies: none
 * Global values: `doT`
